Whittier.Schurr High School: Schurr High School is a public high school which is part of the Montebello Unified School District, and has an enrollment of approximately 3,500 students in grades 9-12. Its campus is located in Montebello, California, United States, a suburb of the Los Angeles metropolitan area. The majority of students attending this school live in the Montebello and Monterey Park area, while some also come from neighboring cities and communities such as Commerce, East Los Angeles, South El Monte and Rosemead.
